select id, name, ip_access_restrictions from tescobankchargebacks.web_channels where ip_access_restrictions is not null
 
--update tescobankchargebacks.web_channels set ip_access_restrictions = NULL where id in ('INTRA0', 'AB912090', '1590605') and ip_access_restrictions is not NULL


select id, name, ip_access_restrictions from tescobank.web_channels where ip_access_restrictions is not null and id in ('INTRA0', 'AB912090')
 
--update tescobank.web_channels set ip_access_restrictions = NULL where id in ('INTRA0', 'AB912090', '1590605') and ip_access_restrictions is not NULL
--INTRA0=178.17.66.1, 178.17.70.1, 86.20.223.123, 151.226.219.214, 85.255.235.155 , 213.143.143.66, 213.143.137.10, 86.10.20.121 , 86.1.223.212, 35.178.115.66,90.202.12.87, 213.143.143.69 ,90.210.181.9, 52.213.8.210, 81.132.157.153, 165.225.80.0/22, 165.225.196.0/23, 165.225.16.0/23, 147.161.166.0/23, 165.225.198.0/23, 185.46.212.88/32, 185.46.212.92/32, 165.225.114.0/23, 165.225.232.0/23, 124.248.141.0/24, 165.225.20.0/23, 165.225.76.0/23, 147.161.184.0/23, 165.225.204.0/23, 197.98.201.0/24, 147.161.162.0/23, 196.23.154.96/27, 165.227.234.101, 165.227.234.135, 81.78.174.107, 90.243.38.11, 81.78.113.34
--AB912090=178.17.66.1, 178.17.70.1, 86.20.223.123, 151.226.219.214, 85.255.235.155 , 213.143.143.66, 213.143.137.10, 86.10.20.121 , 86.1.223.212, 35.178.115.66,90.202.12.87, 213.143.143.69 ,90.210.181.9, 52.213.8.210, 81.132.157.153

update tescobank.web_channels set ip_access_restrictions = '178.17.66.1, 178.17.70.1, 86.20.223.123, 151.226.219.214, 85.255.235.155 , 213.143.143.66, 213.143.137.10, 86.10.20.121 , 86.1.223.212, 35.178.115.66,90.202.12.87, 213.143.143.69 ,90.210.181.9, 52.213.8.210, 81.132.157.153, 165.225.80.0/22, 165.225.196.0/23, 165.225.16.0/23, 147.161.166.0/23, 165.225.198.0/23, 185.46.212.88/32, 185.46.212.92/32, 165.225.114.0/23, 165.225.232.0/23, 124.248.141.0/24, 165.225.20.0/23, 165.225.76.0/23, 147.161.184.0/23, 165.225.204.0/23, 197.98.201.0/24, 147.161.162.0/23, 196.23.154.96/27, 165.227.234.101, 165.227.234.135, 81.78.174.107, 90.243.38.11, 81.78.113.34'
where id = 'INTRA0' and ip_access_restrictions is NULL
